TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HMACRIPEMD160 extends System.Security.Cryptography.HMAC

summary.span: 使用 雜湊函式，計算雜湊架構訊息驗證碼 (Hash-based Message Authentication Code，HMAC)。

span.span: Computes a Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) by using the hash function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一種金鑰雜湊演算法，從 ripemd-160 雜湊函式建構用做為雜湊式訊息驗證碼 (HMAC)。 is a type of keyed hash algorithm that is constructed from the RIPEMD-160 hash function and used as a Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC). HMAC 程序會與訊息資料混合秘密金鑰、 雜湊的雜湊函式的結果、 再次混合該雜湊值與秘密金鑰，，然後套用第二次雜湊函式的資料。The HMAC process mixes a secret key with the message data, hashes the result with the hash function, mixes that hash value with the secret key again, and then applies the hash function a second time. 輸出雜湊是 160 位元長度。The output hash is 160 bits in length. HMAC 可用來判斷透過不安全的通道傳送的訊息是否遭竄改的寄件者和收件者共用秘密金鑰。An HMAC can be used to determine whether a message sent over an insecure channel has been tampered with, provided that the sender and receiver share a secret key. 寄件者會計算原始資料的雜湊值，並將原始資料和雜湊值傳送為單一訊息。The sender computes the hash value for the original data and sends both the original data and the hash value as a single message. 收件者所接收訊息的雜湊值將會重新計算，並檢查計算的 HMAC 符合傳輸的 HMAC。The receiver recalculates the hash value on the received message and checks that the computed HMAC matches the transmitted HMAC. 資料或雜湊值的任何變更會導致不相符，因為知識祕密金鑰，才能變更訊息及重新產生正確的雜湊值。Any change to the data or the hash value results in a mismatch, because knowledge of the secret key is required to change the message and reproduce the correct hash value. 因此，如果原始和計算的雜湊值相符，驗證訊息。Therefore, if the original and computed hash values match, the message is authenticated. 接受的任何大小的索引鍵，並產生 160 位元的雜湊順序。 accepts keys of any size, and produces a hash sequence that is 160 bits long. RIPEMD 雜湊演算法和其後續任務由歐洲敞開專案所開發的。The RIPEMD hash algorithm and its successors were developed by the European RIPE project. 原始 RIPEMD 演算法設計用來取代 MD4 和 MD5 稍後我們增強和重新命名 ripemd-160。The original RIPEMD algorithm was designed to replace MD4 and MD5 and was later strengthened and renamed RIPEMD-160. Ripemd-160 雜湊演算法可產生 160 位元雜湊值。The RIPEMD-160 hash algorithm produces a 160-bit hash value. 此演算法的設計工具將它置於公用網域。The algorithm's designers have placed it in the public domain. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用簽署檔案物件，然後確認該檔案。The following example shows how to sign a file by using the object and then how to verify the file. [!code-cpp[HMACRIPEMD160#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/HMACRIPEMD160/CPP/hmacripemd160.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HMACRIPEMD160#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/HMACRIPEMD160/CS/hmacripemd160.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HMACRIPEMD160#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/HMACRIPEMD160/vb/hmacripemd160.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用隨機產生的 64 位元組金鑰，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a randomly generated 64-byte key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一種金鑰雜湊演算法，從 ripemd-160 雜湊函式建構用做為雜湊式訊息驗證碼 (HMAC)。 is a type of keyed hash algorithm that is constructed from the RIPEMD-160 hash function and used as a Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC). HMAC 程序會與訊息資料混合秘密金鑰、 雜湊的雜湊函式的結果、 再次混合該雜湊值與秘密金鑰，，然後套用第二次雜湊函式的資料。The HMAC process mixes a secret key with the message data, hashes the result with the hash function, mixes that hash value with the secret key again, and then applies the hash function a second time. 輸出雜湊是 160 個位元組的長度。The output hash is 160 bytes in length. 這個建構函式會使用 64 位元隨機產生的金鑰。This constructor uses a 64-byte, randomly generated key.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(unsigned int8[] key) cil managed

param.name: key
param.span: 金鑰可以是任何長度，但其長度若超過 64 個位元組，便會使用 SHA-1 進行雜湊，以衍生 64 位元組金鑰。

span.span: The key can be any length, but if it is more than 64 bytes long it is hashed (using SHA-1) to derive a 64-byte key.

param.span: 因此，秘密金鑰的建議大小為 64 個位元組。

span.span: Therefore, the recommended size of the secret key is 64 bytes.

summary.span: 使用指定的金鑰資料，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified key data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一種金鑰雜湊演算法，從 ripemd-160 雜湊函式建構用做為雜湊式訊息驗證碼 (HMAC)。 is a type of keyed hash algorithm that is constructed from the RIPEMD-160 hash function and used as a Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC). HMAC 程序會與訊息資料混合秘密金鑰、 雜湊的雜湊函式的結果、 再次混合該雜湊值與秘密金鑰，，然後套用第二次雜湊函式的資料。The HMAC process mixes a secret key with the message data, hashes the result with the hash function, mixes that hash value with the secret key again, and then applies the hash function a second time. 輸出雜湊是 160 個位元組的長度。The output hash is 160 bytes in length. ## Examples 如需如何使用這個建構函式的範例，請參閱類別。For an example of how to use this constructor, see the class.
